title: How's Urgot ADC?
body:
Have never seen him in a game I've played in.
And I'm considering playing him for fun.

replies.body:
Pretty bad, since he is not an ADC.

Low range, gets harassed a lot, weak early game and mana issues, low mobility.

he has insane armor shred, so him with ashe/mf support is actually one of his better comps.  his main drawback (if you consider it a drawback) is that his main items give him tank stats that spend his power budget on instead of more damage.  his harass is pretty mean too with his lock on q
